name: wiki-generator
description: Wiki Pages Generator for Free Code Camp

scripts.init-pages: git submodule init && git submodule update --remote && cd wiki-master && git checkout master && cd ../wiki-gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && cd ..
scripts.copy-assets: ./node_modules/.bin/rimraf wiki-gh-pages/* && mkdir wiki-gh-pages/images/ && cp -r wiki-master/images/* wiki-gh-pages/images && cp -r public/* wiki-gh-pages/ && mkdir -p wiki-gh-pages/css && cp -r css/* wiki-gh-pages/css/
scripts.save-pages: cd wiki-gh-pages/ && git add -A && git commit -m 'Page built on `date +"%d-%m-%Y %T"`' && git push origin gh-pages && cd ..
scripts.just-deploy: npm run init-pages && npm run create-struc && npm run build && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-templates && npm run save-pages
scripts.preview: npm run init-pages && npm run create-struc && npm run build && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-templates && npm run start

author: Free Code Camp
